attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the perpetuating immigration situation.We appeal to the Prime Minister to scrap/write off local council debts to enable the councils to embark on building new homes to meet the rising demand,not to do so forces people to take on mortgages which they can ill afford in order to find suitable accommodation for their family puting undue strain on their financies...in the light of the current housing market spiraling out of control and proportion, young families will have no other choice but to seek local authority housing..The whole idea of the tennants right to buy was a mistake which has led to this desperate situation of housing shortage.. Please write off these decade old debts and help us build a substantial amount of new council houses.
